title: I'm still having some lingering lag issues that seem related to yesterday's problems...
body: My client is loading slowly, sometimes unable to display content, last night after the issues were mostly resolved I hopped into a custom game scrim and found that I was experiencing packet loss lag. Please let me know if there's anything I can do to fix these issues, or if it is a known problem that is being worked on. My service provider is Kogan Internet (NBN) and my internet service is working fine otherwise.

replies.body: Update: had 2 games this morning, one was okay with it only occuring maybe 10 times during the entire game, the second game it was occuring with a frequency of about 1-2 times every ten seconds, usually dropping connection for 1-3 seconds (packet loss style where every character walks on the spot then jumps forwards). Still not sure what to do, hoping it's just the weather in Sydney that has caused this {{champion:32}}
